text: @BarackObama If you KNEW that something was coming down the pike as far as a global pandemic based on what you knew and your officials, WHY didn't you start a Public Awareness Campaign, a Hashtag, TWEET about it, give speeches??  Something!  You have things to answer for, and the Press!!!!!!!
